greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = d(n+d(n)) - d(n), where d(n) is the number of divisors of n (A000005).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[DivisorSigma[0, n + DivisorSigma[0, n]] - DivisorSigma[0, n], {n, 109}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, May 21 2017 *)
program: from sympy import divisor_count as d
def a(n): return d(n + d(n)) - d(n) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 21 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 21 2017
